short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Protect sensitive information from being sent to AI Tools

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Spiirk is your digital shield against accidental data leaks on ChatGPT. Ensure your sensitive information like phone numbers, bank details, emails, credit cards, social security numbers, and addresses stays private. Spiirk detects sensitive data while you interact with ChatGPT, warns you and offers automatic redaction of the data in real-time.

Features:
🔒 Customize your privacy with options to toggle protection for various personal information.
⚠️ Receive real-time alerts if sensitive data is detected in your ChatGPT input.
🚫 Quickly redact personal information with a simple button before sending your message in ChatGPT.
🔐 All processing is done locally on your device, ensuring your data remains secure.

Follow us on X for the latest updates and tips: 
x.com/getspiirk
